alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 10:33PM EDT until May 10 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin...Michigan... Menominee River near McAllister affecting Menominee and Marinette Counties. Menominee River near Florence affecting Iron, Dickinson and Florence Counties. For the Menominee River...including Florence, McAllister...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near Florence. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding is confined to lowland and wooded land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady around 9.1 feet before falling below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Menominee River Florence 9.0 9.1 Mon 9 pm 9.1 8.6 8.3 7.9 7.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon.
